sector-cash-and-bank-balances.Note: Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-cash-and-bank-balances.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-investments.Note: Investments net of provisions. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-investments.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-loans-and-advances-(net).Note: Loans and advances net of Loan loss provision and interest in suspense. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-loans-and-advances-(net).Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-leasing.Note: Leasing balance. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-leasing.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-hire-purchase.Note: Hire purchase balance. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-hire-purchase.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-loans.Note: Loans and Advances given other than on Lease, Hire purchase, real estates and pawning. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-loans.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-pawning-advances.Note: Pawning Advances. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-pawning-advances.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-fixed-assets.Note: Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-fixed-assets.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-capital-account.Note: Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-capital-account.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-borrowings-to-equity.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
sector-borrowings-to-equity.Note: Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-borrowings-to-equity.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-core-capital-ratio.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
sector-core-capital-ratio.Note: The ratio of Core Capital (Tier 1) to Risk Weighted Assets. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-core-capital-ratio.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-gross-non-performing-ratio.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
sector-gross-non-performing-ratio.Note: Ratio of gross non-performing advances to total advances.Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-gross-non-performing-ratio.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-net-non-performing-ratio.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
sector-net-non-performing-ratio.Note: Ratio of non-performing loans net of interest in suspense and loan loss provisions to total loans and advances. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-net-non-performing-ratio.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-net-interest-margin-(nim).Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
sector-net-interest-margin-(nim).Note: The ratio of interest income less interest expenses (annualized) to average assets. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-net-interest-margin-(nim).Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-efficiency-ratio.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
sector-efficiency-ratio.Note: The ratio of non-interest expenses to total income less interest expenses, loan loss provisions and loans written off and this Ratio is restated from Dec 13 to consider the impact of the loan loss provision and loans written off. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows
sector-efficiency-ratio.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-liquid-assets-to-total-assets.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
sector-liquid-assets-to-total-assets.Note: Liquid Assets=Regulatory liquid assets, Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-liquid-assets-to-total-assets.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-liquid-assets-to-borrowings.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
sector-liquid-assets-to-borrowings.Note: Liquid Assets=Regulatory liquid assets, Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-liquid-assets-to-borrowings.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-number-of-branches-(total).Update frequency: Within 2 months from the reporting date
